paper_abstract: Bugs in industrial financial systems have not been extensively studied. To address this gap, we focused on the empirical study of bugs in three systems, PMS, beta-Analyzer, and OrderPro. Results showed the 3 most common types of bugs in industrial financial systems to be internal interface (19.00%), algorithm/ method (17.67%), and logic (15.00%).
paper_title: An Empirical Study of Bugs in Industrial Financial Systems
